item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-04-16
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• CSI just quoted Ghostbusters. "I collect spores, molds, and fungus." #
  • I'm at VCA Brookline Animal Hospital (678 Brookline Avenue, Brookline). #
  • I'm at Popovers (Congress St, Portsmouth). #
  • Smoke Salmon in a popover @ Popovers #
  • On our way to Maine for our 6 year anniversary. What do we talk about on the way up? Connecting to a new API for FictFact, ahhhh love. #

Powered by Twitter Tools
